channel.title: SharePoint on Microsoft 365 Community Blog
channel.description: Recent content in SharePoint on Microsoft 365 Community Blog

item.title: CLI for Microsoft 365 v5.2
item.description: We’ve just published a new major version of the CLI for Microsoft 365 with new commands for working with and managing Microsoft 365 and SharePoint Framework projects on any platform.

item.title: How to rename files in SharePoint with Power Automate
item.description: Although SharePoint and Power Automate are heavily interwoven, there is no “rename file” action in Power Automate - if the file lives in a SharePoint library.

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 21st of March, 2022
item.description: Three demos – Introduction to Adaptive Card Design Gallery reusable reference sample, Using Adaptive Cards control from the PnP control gallery in SPFx solutions, and Navigating Cards in Viva Connections ACEs. Released SPFx beta v1.15, CLI v5.2, PnP Modern Search v4.6.1 and 14 samples!

item.title: PnP PowerShell v1.10
item.description: PnP PowerShell is a cross-platform PowerShell Module providing over 600 cmdlets that work with Microsoft 365 environments and more specifically SharePoint Online, Microsoft Teams, Microsoft Planner and Power Automate.

item.title: How to use oh-my-posh with PnPPowerShell
item.description: What is oh my posh? Oh-my-posh is an amazing prompt engine that does not only pretty up the terminal you use, but it will ease your work.

item.title: CLI for Microsoft 365 v5.1
item.description: Manage Microsoft 365 and SharePoint Framework projects on any platform CLI for Microsoft 365 is a cross-platform CLI that allows you to manage various configuration settings of Microsoft 365 and SharePoint Framework projects no matter which operating system or shell you use.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Call – 15th of March, 2022
item.description: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - weekly community call recording from March 15th, is now available from the Microsoft 365 Community YouTube channel at http://aka.

item.title: Displaying selected SharePoint form fields as read-only using List Formatting
item.description: With the setValue action on SharePoint/Microsoft Lists JSON formatting, people from the community are creating several solutions or use cases, including myself in the two samples: Quick Approvals and Like/Dislike.

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 10th of March, 2022
item.description: Latest news from Microsoft engineering on Microsoft 365 topics; Three demos: Siddharth Vaghasia – My Emails Viva Connections Adaptive Card Extension, Yves Habersaat – Getting started with Microsoft Graph Toolkit and SharePoint Framework, Paolo Pialorsi – Using Microsoft Graph APIs in Viva Connection ACEs

item.title: Migrate Cloud Flows and Canvas Apps across tenants
item.description: Introduction If you are a Power App or Power Automate developer, chances are you had to move your creations between SharePoint sites or even Microsoft 365 tenants.

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 156 - João Ferreira
item.description: In this installment of the weekly discussion revolving around the latest news and topics on Microsoft 365, hosts – Vesa Juvonen (Microsoft), Waldek Mastykarz (Microsoft) are joined by Portugal based, technologist, author, MVP Office Dev and Windows Insider, João Ferreira (Beezy).

item.description: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - weekly community call recording from March 8th, is now available from the Microsoft 365 Community YouTube channel at http://aka.

item.description: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - weekly community call recording from March 1st, is now available from the Microsoft 365 Community YouTube channel at http://aka.

item.title: CLI for Microsoft 365 v5.0
item.description: We’ve just published a new major version of the CLI for Microsoft 365 with new commands for working with and managing Microsoft 365 and SharePoint Framework projects on any platform.

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 24th of February, 2022
item.description: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework bi-weekly community call recording from February 24th is now available from the Microsoft 365 Community YouTube channel at http://aka.ms/m365pnp/videos. You can use SharePoint Framework for building solutions for Microsoft Teams and for SharePoint Online

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 154 - Vardhaman Deshpande
item.description: In this installment of the weekly discussion revolving around the latest news and topics on Microsoft 365, hosts – Vesa Juvonen (Microsoft), Waldek Mastykarz (Microsoft) are joined by London/India - based Developer, Product Owner, Technical Architect, MVP, Vardhaman Deshpande (Valo Solutions).

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Community Call recording – 17th of February, 2022
item.description: One location the Microsoft 365 tenant – script samples gallery (138 scenarios and 193 scripts) now integrated into Sample Solution Gallery! Sign up and attend an AMA and other events this month hosted by Sharing is Caring. Added today - Ask me anything (PnPjs 3.0 – March 15th) and don’t forget the AMA on February 22 – PnP React Controls. Get the recognition you deserve, sign up for the PnP Recognition Program. Released Yo teams - yoteams-build-core v1.6.0 and Microsoft Graph Toolkit (MGT) v2.3.2, and Refreshed the MGT playground! To see current releases and latest updates/nightly builds, access the Repos via the links in table below. There were 6 new/updated script, 46 Bot samples, 2 Power Platform samples delivered this week. Wanted! – Teams Samples.

item.description: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - weekly community call recording from February 15th, is now available from the Microsoft 365 Community YouTube channel at http://aka.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Community Call recording – 3rd of February, 2022
item.description: One location the Microsoft 365 tenant – script samples gallery (136 scenarios and 187 scripts) including recently added Teams PowerShell support! Sign up and attend an AMA and other events this month hosted by Sharing is Caring. Get the recognition you deserve, sign up for the PnP Recognition Program. Heads down on PnP projects. Expecting to ship Microsoft Graph Toolkit v2.3.2 on Friday! To see current releases and latest updates/nightly builds, access the Repos via the links in table below. There were 5 new/updated script, 5 Power Platform samples delivered this week.

item.title: Power Apps Community Call – January 2022
item.description: Topics covered in this month’s community call includes 2 demos: Power Audio Player (Canvas app, modified audio control functionality, SharePoint list back-end) - Shadrack Inusah (DreamOval) and New Pay as you go Features (Public Preview - Power Apps Premium environments with Azure subscription) - Kavishi Agarwal (Microsoft), Recent Power Apps News and Community Contributions (Power Platform ALM Accelerator, Power Apps portals and Power Apps Ideas) – Todd Baginski (Canviz) and learn about 5 new PnP Power Apps Samples – April Dunnam (Microsoft). This call included the first ever Power Apps Community Call Quiz – using a Power App and played during the live call. This call was hosted by Todd Baginski (Canviz). The call was recorded on January 19, 2022. Questions addressed in chat throughout the call.

item.title: Getting started with SharePoint's custom view formatting
item.description: Introduction In a previous blog post, the basic building blocks of custom column formatting were introduced to us.

item.title: Getting started with SharePoint's custom column formatting
item.description: Have you ever wished that you could turn your boring old SharePoint list, full of useful data as it may be, into something with a little more pizzazz?
